name: Orion (itch) (mmichel)
description:
Orion is a space oriented magical cardgame played like Magic the Gathering and Hearthstone.

Defeat your opponent by attacking his hero and ships, stealing his resources and asteroids and many more actions.

See this wiki for more info: https://tocadovision.gitbook.io/orion/

If you like the game, consider becoming a Patron!
https://patreon.com/user?u=10926888

This game is under active development and will get new releases weekly. Including new cards and actions plus bugfixes.
